casebody.head_matter:
524 A.2d 490
ELECTRO-SPACE FABRICATORS, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 8, 1987.
Decided April 20, 1987.
Donald LaBarre, Jr., Allentown, for appellant.
Bryan E. Barbin, Harrisburg, Suellen M. Wolfe, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
